travelPackages.name: Sundarbans Wildlife Adventure
travelPackages.description: Explore the world's largest mangrove forest and witness the majestic Royal Bengal Tiger.
highlights: Wildlife spotting (Royal Bengal Tiger, deer, crocodiles)

travelPackages.name: Cox’s Bazar Beach Retreat
travelPackages.description: Relax on the longest natural sea beach in the world with luxury accommodations and thrilling activities.
highlights: Speedboat ride to Saint Martin’s Island

travelPackages.name: Sylhet Tea Garden Escape
travelPackages.description: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of Sylhet’s lush green tea gardens and waterfalls.
inclusions: Excursion to Jaflong & Ratargul Swamp Forest
highlights: Boat ride through Ratargul Swamp Forest
